AirDensity.StatDescription: Controls how big of a jump a vehicle will get after a jump. Higher the smaller the jump and lower higher the jump.

VehicleMaxRPM.StatDescription: Controls the vehicle's acceleration. Setting this too high will cause the vehicle to auto drive.

VehicleMinRPM.StatDescription: Setting this stat to close to min/opt rpm will cause the vehicle to go very fast in reverse and slowly gain speed after taping the accelerator.

VehicleMaxTorque.StatDescription: The boost speed when first accelerating if set too high can cause the vehicle to go extremely fast with no control over it.

VehicleOptRPM.StatDescription: The higher this value is the faster the vehicle will go over time the accelerator is held down.

TorqueFactorAtMax.StatDescription: Gives a boost of speed when first pressing the accelerator the higher the value the bigger the boost.

MinSpeedForWheelies.StatDescription: Recommended to give this a higher value to stop motorbikes from constantly doing wheelies.

MinSpeedToEjectPlayer.StatDescription: Recommended to set this value high to stop constantly being leached off motorbikes.

ExtraTorqueFactor.StatDescription: This value doesn't do much, but when it is to a very high value it cause the vehicle to spin uncontrollably when using it.

SkateboardInitialSpeed.StatDescription: The launch speed for the skate board setting this very high will teleport to the object you will collide with.

SkateboardRideSpeed.StatDescription: The maximum speed the skateboard can go you will keep gaining speed each time you kick off the floor.

SkateMaxRotateSpeed.StatDescription: The max speed the skateboard will rotate at.

SkateboardRotateSpeed.StatDescription: TThe speed the Skateboard will rotate at (will not rotate faster than what the max rotate speed is set to).

SkateboardEjectSpeed.StatDescription: Recommend to set the value high to stop you from being knocked off the skateboard.

DamagetoEnemys.StatDescription: The base damage done when hitting an enemy NPC's with a vehicle.

SpeedtoDamageBoss.StatDescription: The minimum speed needed to deal damage to enemy NPC's.

DamagePerKMHBoss.StatDescription: The faster you go the more damage you do to enemy NPC's.

SpeedDamageSurv.StatDescription: The minimum speed needed to deal damage to a survivor.

DamagePerKMHSurv.StatDescription: The faster you go in a vehicle the more damage is done to survivors.

NPCHealthAmount.StatDescription: This will effect all NPCs apart from looters, mercenary's and zombies.

NPCPhotoPP.StatDescription: The max amount of PP you can get from photos of NPCs.

FireRate.StatDescription: The firing speed for all full auto firearms.

BulletRange.StatDescription: Max range for fire arms to shoot.

BulletsPerShot.StatDescription: The number of bullets per shot, this might cause some firearms to glitch and constantly shoot if this happens just drop and pick it back up again.

BurstBulletCount.StatDescription: Number of bullest fired from a burst shot.

Durability.StatDescription: The health for items, vehicles and the amount of ammo firearms have.

ThrowForce.StatDescription: How far you can throw items you have picked up. This is different for each item in the game.

MoneyPickUp.StatDescription: The amount of money the player is given when picking up cash. (There are 9 different types of money pick ups).

PayoutAmount.StatDescription: The payout you get from winning a slot machine.

PayoutCount.StatDescription: How many times you can win on a slot machine before you start losing.

PPAwarded.StatDescription: The amount of PP awarded for completing a minigame.

PPForPhotos.StatDescription: The amount of PP awarded for taking pictures of genres with your camera.

PPForKills.StatDescription: The amount of PP awarded for killing zombies with weapons.

PPMultiplier.StatDescription: How much PP is multiplied when you own that weapon's combo card.

SprayItemAmmo.StatDescription: The amount of ammo spray items have. This shows up in the game as a percentage.

ExplodeRadius.StatDescription: This will affect everything that explodes including explosive firearms like the rocket launcher.

ExplosiveDamage.StatDescription: As long as you have more than 1 bar of HP, you will not die instantly to explosions. (Most of the time).

DetonationDelay.StatDescription: Time till explosives detonate this includes projectile explosives as well.

ProjectileSpin.StatDescription: How much a projectile will start to drift from the center crosshair once it's been shot.

MeleeDamage.StatDescription: The amount of damage melee attacks do. This also includes zombie melee damage.

HealthRestoreAmount.StatDescription: The amount of health restored by eating food items (every 100 equals one health bar).

ThrownItemDamage.StatDescription: Amount of damage done when an item as be thrown.

MaxDamageAttack.StatDescription: The maximum damage for each hit this affects everything apart from firearms and explosives.
